entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
